issue.title: [C++] on Ubuntu 21.04 with system libs flight is not linked against libprotobuf
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13556](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13556). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
On Ubuntu 21.04 with grpc and protbuf installed in the OS the I can compile arrow with flight enabled but after linking the libarrow_flight.so is not linked against libprotobuf. This will cause executing to fail with undefined protobuf symbols.
